title: HyperSync UX Presentation Preset
description: Concrete binding of an ActivityContext slice plus a PresentationSchema into a named preset for operators.

version.description: Semantic version of this preset definition.

name.description: Human-readable name for this preset (e.g. 'CFD Debugging – Abacus First').

description.description: Detailed description of when an operator should use this preset.

schema_id.description: Reference to a PresentationSchema.schema_id that this preset instantiates.

applicable_activity_filters.description: Simple filter grammar over ActivityContext used by the planner to auto-suggest this preset.

default_parameters.description: Default parameterization of the underlying schema views (zoom levels, which metrics are pinned, etc.).

audio_profile_override.description: Optional overrides for the schema-level audio_profile for this preset.
